creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: 24 appliqued squares, some divided into four small squares; each square has four appliqued corners forming scrolls or scallops; smaller appliques form center designs applied by coarse couching; border crudely constructed from scrap red and blue pieces; blue and white
title: Quilt
